about.title: About us
about.text: We are a team of professionals in the wood processing and the creation of wooden furniture of the highest class

decor.title: Decor
decor.text: We make all types of wooden decor as per design given by Architect,Interior designer, contractor which is suitable your premises.

furniture.title: Furniture
furniture.text: Wooder utilizes materials otherwise left behind, rendered useless in their original intent. By creating new pieces made of reclaimed barnwood

quality.title: wooder – is quality
quality.text: We create unique design objects made of rare wood, specially under the order. Look at the short video about our work.

video.title: we Do the design of any complexity
video.text: This is a team of professionals that make the furniture and wood décor high standard. Creating modern designs. Adhering to the global quality standards. And we are doing work with love.
